author: IGN
description:
Check out the full episode on IGN Games: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EMM5i2iRvZI

We finally got our best look yet at Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, and the NVC crew is breaking it all down! Join Logan Plant and Seth Macy as they share their reactions to Samus Aran’s long-awaited return, discuss how the gameplay and visuals are shaping up on Switch 2, and what this means for the future of the Metroid franchise. After years of silence, Prime 4: Beyond looks like it’s been worth the wait.

#MetroidPrime4 #Nintendo #Gaming
title: Metroid Prime 4 Beyond: New Trailer + New Re9 Pro Controller! - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the 'Story So Far' trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest Black Ops addition to the hit first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. The story began with one man, Raul Menendez, a Nicaraguan arms dealer turned populist leader. His personal vendetta against the United States unleashed cyber warfare and a global propaganda storm. And out of the storm, new powers emerged. The Guild is reborn as a powerful tech giant offering peace and protection in uncertain times. Explore a new era of Black Ops. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 launches on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official 'Story So Far' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out League of Legends' next champion, Zaahen, the Unsundered, in this preview trailer for the hit action team-based MOBA developed by Riot Games. Players will get a glimpse of Zaahen's abilities and gameplay... Steel the mind, temper the flesh, and hunt the fallen. Death has no dominion. Coming November 19.

#IGN #Gaming
title: League of Legends - Official Next Champion 'Zaahen, the Unsundered' Preview Trailer
